pullRequest.title: Revamp Role Permissions as Scope Assignments
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR revamps the Role Permissions UI as Scope Assignments to avoid confusions with the role permission settings in the management console.

Changed feature title
Changed button and label texts
Updated other terminology to scope assignment/mapping related terms
Added a warning message when adding a new scope mapping with either alias or scope assignments

Fixes wso2/product-apim#9572

commit.message: Revamp role permission as scope assignment

nodes.bodyText: Scope assignments are only related to internal, APIM-specific scope assignments. They are not related to role permission assignments in the Management Console.
